```{r include=FALSE}
# store the id of my complete presentation
gpres <- "162GS7ArBPM4w_rPazcUrpnoEKT7jx9i7fpPQkH_iC_0"

google_slides_image <- function(presentation_id, slide_id) {
  paste0("https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/", presentation_id, "/export/png?id=", presentation_id, "&pageid=", slide_id)
}
```

# Google Slide Images

Here is an image from a Google Slide

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics(google_slides_image(gpres, slide_id = "gd5c49c5c55_0_165"))
```

Here is the same image using `img src`

<img src=`r google_slides_image(gpres, slide_id="gd5c49c5c55_0_165")`>
